news.title: New Paper Accepted at ACL 2024
news.content: Our work on comprehensive LLM evaluation frameworks has been accepted at ACL 2024.

news.title: Research Grant Awarded
news.content: Received NSF grant for studying fairness in retrieval-augmented generation systems.

news.title: New Lab Members
news.content: Welcome to our new PhD students joining the Starlight Lab!

news.title: Workshop Success
news.content: Successfully hosted the first Starlight Lab Workshop on LLM Evaluation.

news.title: Industry Collaboration
